items.name: Casket-salvaging scrimshaw
items.description: Successful fishing catches have a chance of finding various caskets. Higher-level fishing provides better chances. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Energy-gathering scrimshaw
items.description: 15% chance to double the energy received when gathering memories. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Gem-finding scrimshaw
items.description: +2% geode chance when mining. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Log-splitting scrimshaw
items.description: 15% chance to split a log as you chop it, gaining additional Woodcutting experience and not collecting the log. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Memory-crushing scrimshaw
items.description: 15% chance to instantly convert memories as you obtain them, gaining Divination experience. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Rock-crushing scrimshaw
items.description: +2% critical chance when mining. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of attack
items.description: Adds 2% to melee accuracy. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of cruelty
items.description: Ranged attacks deal increased damage. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of magic
items.description: Adds 2% to magic accuracy. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of ranging
items.description: Adds 2% to ranged accuracy. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of the elements
items.description: Every magic attack hits with a small amount of elemental damage. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Scrimshaw of vampyrism
items.description: For every successful melee attack, this scrimshaw absorbs a small amount of the enemy's health, giving it to the scrimshaw bearer. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Sign of death
items.description: If you die with this sign equipped, you will be restored to 15% of your health, while inflicting that much damage on your attacker. Does not work in PvP areas. Shares the 1-hour cooldown.

items.name: Sign of item protection
items.description: If you die with this sign equipped, you will be able to protect an additional item. Does not work in PvP areas.

items.name: Sign of life
items.description: If you die with this equipped, you will be revived with 25% of your health. Does not work in PvP areas. Signs and portents of life and death share a 1-hour cooldown.

items.name: Sign of respite I
items.description: This one-use sign extends the duration of your gravestone by 12 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 minutes. Equip the sign before death or while you have an active gravestone.

items.name: Sign of respite II
items.description: This one-use sign extends the duration of your gravestone by 21 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 minutes. Equip the sign before death or while you have an active gravestone.

items.name: Sign of respite III
items.description: This one-use sign extends the duration of your gravestone by 30 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 minutes. Equip the sign before death or while you have an active gravestone.

items.name: Tree-shaking scrimshaw
items.description: Increases the drop rate of bird nests by 300%. Lasts 3 hours.

items.name: Whopper-baiting scrimshaw
items.description: 15% chance to bait a whopper fish, gaining additional Fishing experience even though you won't land it. Lasts 3 hours.
